=== PNYTeam ===

Welcome to the homepage of the Potsdam, NY locoteam. Right now it's just a start up as a joint effort between <nowiki>[[http://cosi.clarkson.edu|The Clarkson Open Source Institute]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.potsdam.edu|SUNY Potsdam]]</nowiki>, but we plan to introduce Ubuntu into the town of Potsdam as well as advocate Ubuntu and be a point of contact and support on the respective campuses.

==== Plans ====

* Installfests
* Deploy Edubuntu into the Potsdam school district
* Provide live support on the Clarkson University and SUNY Potsdam campuses

==== Members ====

* ChrisPeterman ( Team Contact )
